plot: Aidan and Suren look forward to their future together, Josh must choose between Julia and Nora, and Sally tries to fix one of the lives that she ruined.

To Aiden's horror, his mother the vampire queen denies even promised rewards for services rendered: Suren isn't promoted but limited to Boston for centuries, he banished if he wants freedom for him and Henry. Aiden convinces Suren to leave for good, but soon finds her too spoiled to sacrifice comfort and Henry's loyalty challenged again. Josh is shattered, yet wishes Aidan well, while wrestling himself with whether to give Julia another chance and told by Nora the only cure is killing his wolf-sire.—KGF Vissers
